attributes.action: exercise his power with strength and courage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To confront the drug companies and their outrageous pricing.
To stand up to the greed of the Banks.
Sort out the oil companies.
To control immigration to one job one person.
Remove the subsidies that make it difficult for people to want to work.
Remove the outrageous expense accounts of MP's and Euro MP's,and make moves to sort out the EU. 
Regulate the fees of solicitors and lawyers, especially when legal aid is used, and make solicitors do a certain percentage of pro bono work each year.
Oh! and can we please see a doctor when we want?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
